amendatorysection.catchline: State Fire Marshal; records public; exceptions.
amendatorysection.para: All records on file in the State Fire Marshal's office shall be public, except any testimony, correspondence, or other matter taken in an investigation or an inspection by, or in a report to, the State Fire Marshal under the provisions of the Nebraska Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1969 and sections 81-501.01 to 81-531 and 81-5,151 to 81-5,157 which he or she in his or her discretion may withhold from the public.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1969, see section 81-552.
